metadata.title: CVE-2024-36903 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:Fix potential uninit-value access in __ip6_make_skb() As it was done incommit fc1092f51567 ("ipv4: Fix uninit-value access in __ip_make_skb()")for IPv4, check FLOWI_FLAG_KNOWN_NH on fl6->flowi6_flags instead of testingHDRINCL on the socket to avoid a race condition which causes uninit-valueaccess.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
